summary:
Harry: why are you always on top?
Tom: because you are my world and when I’m in bed with you I feel like I’m on top of the...
body:
Harry: why are you always on top?
Tom: because you are my world and when I’m in bed with you I feel like I’m on top of the world. 
Harry: well, you are going to hit the rock bottom tonight. 
Tom: are you referring to your ass or the position?

summary:
Warner Brothers Studio is the place where you can stay for a week and this will not be enough!
Harry Potter Studio, which is...
body:
Warner Brothers Studio is the place where you can stay for a week and this will not be enough!

  • Harry Potter Studio, which is located in the suburbs of London, is the place where you can see all the vehicles and sceneries which were created especially for films about Harry Potter. You can buy chocolate frog, try butterbeer, fly on a magic broom, and of course you can enter the Hogwarts Express. Here you will plunge into the atmosphere of magic and feel yourself like a wizard! 🔮✨🧙‍♀️🧙‍♂️

body:

Harry: It can be anyone. How did he look like?
Dudley: He was tall, blond, pale, grey eyes, pointy face...
Harry: Ah that'd be Draco, my boyfriend

summary: Hey I feel like this is a shit theory only bc I haven’t seen a lot of people address it but is it POSSIBLE that the chamber of...
body:
Hey I feel like this is a shit theory only bc I haven’t seen a lot of people address it but is it POSSIBLE that the chamber of secrets is the last “sunken” vault? Like when the Merlin portrait said there was a beast (??) inside? And it’s in a fairly unsuspecting location, the girls bathroom, just like the empty corridor and the library. Petrification is a pretty solid curse, albeit not in the same way the other vaults were cursed.

The biggest downside to this being at all feasible would be that the curse obviously doesn’t break in MC’s time at hogwarts, but 2 years after graduating, during Potter’s second year.

Also I GUESS this would mean R is Riddle??

I’ve been thinking about this a lot please @ me

summary: actually, in regards to that last reblog, any of y’all got any fun crackships, crossover or otherwise? off the top of my head,...
body:
actually, in regards to that last reblog, any of y’all got any fun crackships, crossover or otherwise?

off the top of my head, I’ve got:
-Draco x Ron (HP)
-Fujimura Taiga x Tsuboi “Klein” Ryoutarou (FS/N, SAO)
-Karasuba x  Louise Valliere (Sekirei x Familiar of Zero) ((this only really exists in my own head ATM and I feel like it needs to be a thing))
-Naruto x Gaara (Naruto) ((entirely because of The Great Shinobi Bake Off recurring comic))

summary: Following spree
title: Following spree
body:
Hello, I really wanna blow some new life into my tumblr, and the way to do this is to follow new people first! I unfollowed 50 inactives so now I need some more gifs on my dash. Reblog this post if you post any of the following shows/movies and I’ll check your blog out. If I already follow you maybe signal boost this post. Thank youu, and I’m looking forward to seeing your blogs!

- Harry Potter
- Lord of the Rings
- B99
- Dynasty
- Sense8 
- Game of Thrones
- Grey’s Anatomy
- Manifest
- The Big Bang Theory
- The 100
- Stranger Things
- Lucifer
- The Rain
- Suits
- The Last Ship

I mean really any multifandom mess can just reblog and I’ll check it out. I blacklist everything I don’t watch anyway

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Okay chilren this here is a deleted sceen from Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. It takes place during the Yule Ball. Snape...
body:
Okay chilren this here is a deleted sceen from Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. It takes place during the Yule Ball. Snape and Kararoff are arguing about the dark mark and Voldemorts possible return while Snape is searching for students in carriages tryna get a lil somethin somethin. I honestly don’t think my life had truely started until I saw this deleted scene. The comment section is pure fucking gold so I thought I’d share some of the best with you guys.

Your welcome.

blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
BE ORIGINAL. BE ANYONE. BE CREATIVE.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS
 Curious about organized crime in the...
caption:
BE ORIGINAL. BE ANYONE. BE CREATIVE.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 14+ YEARS

Curious about organized crime in the magical world? Want to develop the quidditch scene? Eager to develop Hogwarts headcanons? If you’re looking for an active, welcoming community of skilled, creative writers who are committed to exploring and expanding Rowling’s fantastical world… JACFC may be the perfect home for you!

summary: *Best of potter puppet pals*
title: *Best of potter puppet pals*
body:
Ron: And I'm trying out for the lead part of Annie! Wish me luck!
Harry: Don't tell me what to wish Ron!
***
Dumbledore: Yes, that's true. I am an android. A gay android. 
***
Harry: Oh, Ginny! You're so hot! You're like a stove!
***
Harry: Goblincrotch!
***
Snape: Do my ears detect foul mouthedness?
Hermione: Oh no, proffess...
Harry: Voldemort's nipple!
Snape: Excuse me?
***
Harry: Pattuletarius-shrinky-dinky!
***
Dumbledore: Gryffindor!
Everyone: Party MORE!
Dumbledore: Hufflepuff!
Everyone: Wizard STUFF!
Dumbledore: Raveclaw!
Everyone: Hell NAH!
Dumbledore: Pretty sure that's everybody!
***
Harry: Aaaah! Face like that should come with a warning!
*** 
Dumbledore: *dressed up* It is I, the Dark Lord Voldemort! 
Harry: Oh My GOD! Where is my machete?! ... I mean wand!
*** 
Snape: 500 THOUSAND points from Gryffindor!
***
Harry: This party is ruining my excellent life! I'm going to crap a castle if I have to endure any more of this lameness!
***
Dumbledore: He just wanted to be your friend and you exploded him!
***
Harry: I have seen some shit!

summary: The Wizarding World is a dangerous place! The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the...
caption:
The Wizarding World is a dangerous place!

The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the shadows as the Dark Lord Voldemort grows ever more powerful. His followers, the Death Eaters, wreak havoc at his behest, striking fear into even the bravest of hearts. But there are those who refuse to give into the darkness. Albus Dumbledore, Headmaster of Hogwarts, leads the Order of the Phoenix, a secret society of courageous witches and wizards determined to battle back against Voldemort’s forces.

The First Wizarding War was never cut and dry, though. Each side comprised of more than simple heroes and villains. They were people, who lived and loved and fought and died. Each had a life and each had a story. What side will you pick and whose story will you tell?

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Our Most Wanted Characters include:

  • James Potter
  • Lily Potter
  • Bellatrix Lestrange
  • Amycus Carrow

And Many MORE!

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

blog.name: readingisloving
blog.title: hold onto me
blog.description: I don't own any story. I'm not a writer just a reader and all I do is make banners or edits for the ones I like.

summary: Breezy Chapter 60: New World
title: Breezy Chapter 60: New World

summary: A-Z Fluff Tom Felton
title: A-Z Fluff Tom Felton
body:
A= Attractive (What do they find attractive about the other?)

I feel like Tom is one of those people to really like how resourceful and witty someone is. So that’s what he finds attractive about you. 

B= Baby (Do they want a family? Why/ Why not?)

Yes? Maybe not right now, but someday soon! Maybe?

C= Cuddle (How do they cuddle?)

He loves to cuddle you whenever he can. Mostly in the privacy of your own home, but sometimes in public. PDA isn’t exactly either of your guy’s favorite. 

D= Dates (What are dates with them like?)

Lots of the typical shit that you both like. Going to dinner, going on walks, seeing a movie. 

E= Everything (You are my ___ (e.g my life, my would…))

You are his # 1 fan, besides his family. 

F= Feelings (When did they know they were falling in love?)

Tom isn’t 100% sure when it was, but he realized one night when he couldn’t sleep. You were peacefully laying next to him while his mind was going a million miles per hour. It just all of a sudden hit him. 

G= Gentle (Are they gentle? If so, how?)

Definitely. He seems like a gentle and loving person. He’s just very loving towards you. 

H= Hand/ Hold (How do they like to hold? How do they like to hold hands?)

He likes to hold your hand when you’re walking somewhere, especially in public. It helps him know that you’re there. 

I= Impression (First Impressions/s)

I have a feeling that he was blown away by your beauty. If not, then he liked how brilliant you seemed. You were reading one of his favorite books. 

J= Joker (Are they into pranks?)

Yes? I’m not sure about this one. 

K= Kisses (How do they kiss?)

Full of passion and love. 

L= Little Things (What little things do they love/ notice.)

He notices how you like to complement random strangers. Tom loves how kind you are to others even if you aren’t feeling very social. 

M= Memory (Their favorite moment together.)

His favorite moment of you two would have to be your first meeting. Like I mentioned, you were reading one of his favorite books so Tom decided to strike up a conversation. That went on for as long as it could before one of you had to leave. 

N= Nickel (Do they spoil? Do they buy the person they love everything?)

He likes to spoil you, but not all at once. It’s spread out throughout the year. He would get you a necklace you liked, a new shirt, etc. Nothing too extravagant. 

O= Orange (What color reminds them of their other half?)

Yellow. You just remind him of the sun and happiness. 

P= Pet names (What pet names do they use?)

Love, babe, etc. The simplistic stuff. 

Q= Questions (What are the questions they’re always asking?)

I think you two would just like to ask a lot of questions. There’s always something new to learn even if you’ve been dating for a while. 

R= Remember (Their favorite memory of each other.)

You’re first meeting. I know it’s nothing exciting, but you guys are just really glad you two talked that day. 

S= Sad (How do they cheer themselves/ each other up.)

Tom cheers himself up by talking to you. If he’s off filming, you two face-time or text for hours. If for some reason you’re busy, he likes to reread old messages. 

T= Talking (What do they love to talk about?)

Anything you two can think of. Mostly the future or about your childhood. 

U= Universe (Use a metaphor, what are they to each other? (e.g he was the universe, ever-changing and mysterious.))

He was your universe and visa versa. (I’m running out of metaphors omg)

V= Very (___ they’re thoughts about each other. (e.g. she’s very smart, he’s very stubborn, they’re very annoying. etc.)

You’re very sharp and wise. 

W= Why (Reasons why they love each other.)

He loves you for so many reasons. You’re kind, loving, smart, etc. 

X= Xylophone (What’s their song?)

Only Us from Dear Evan Hansen 

Y= You (The ___ to my ___ (e.g the cookies to my milk, the macaroni to my cheese.))

You’re the words to his book? I’m also running out of these examples. Send me some, my dudes.

Z= Zebra (If they wanted a pet, what pet would they get?)

I’m not sure what kind of animal, but you two definitely get one. 

-introvertedhuman01
